messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Namban Tsuba book
messages.msgSnippet: Ron, This site sold one: http://www.jpsword.com/files/specials.html Maybe they know a source. Anthony Ron Hartmann  wrote: Awhile back
messages.messageBody:
Ron,

This site sold one:

http://www.jpsword.com/files/specials.html

Maybe they know a source.

Anthony
Ron Hartmann <swords@...> wrote:
Awhile back mention was made of a book titled: Namban Tsuba by Yoshimura Shigeta (1998). Does anyone know a source for this book? Nothing found through Amazon.com. Thanks.

Ron
STL
